articles.title: RFK Jr. to face questions about chaos at the CDC - NPR
articles.description: Democratic lawmakers and more than a thousand current and former HHS staff say Kennedy's actions are endangering America's health. Kennedy says he came to clean house and he's delivering.
articles.content:
Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is testifying before the Senate Finance Committee on Thursday. 
The hearing comes a week after Kennedy pressured the brand-new Centers for D… [+4484 chars]

articles.author: Olivia Hebert
articles.title: 'Dangerous' Chagas disease confirmed in California, raising concerns for Bay Area - SFGATE
articles.description: Experts are worried that Chagas, a parasitic disease endemic to Latin America, will come to the Bay Area after cases were confirmed in Southern California.
articles.content:
A Conenose bug or kissing bug.
California Department of Public Health/Getty Images/iStockphoto
A parasitic disease endemic to Latin America has now been confirmed in California, according to state … [+3003 chars]
